Education: | Dr. rer. nat. Physics PhD, <br>Diploma in physics, <br>second diploma thesis in computer science
Relevant Skills: | > 8 years of experience in management in agile environments<br>>15 years work experience in web- and security related IT. Responsible for availability, performance and security of www.xing.com from 2007-2011.<br><br>Technical skills: <br>OS: Linux, Unix<br>Programming Languages/Architectures: javascript, node.js, C, parallel C, PASCAL, FORTRAN, Assembler, Shell Programmierung, HTML, Java, J2EE, AJAX, PHP, Ruby on Rails , SAP (BC315 Performance), perl, awk, MySQL, JBOSS, BEA Weblogic Integration, Tomcat, Apache, IBM Webshpere Portal, ...<br>QA Skills:<br>Test Management, Test-Automation (Selenium, jmeter),...<br><br>Product Skills:<br>Analysis and Design (User Stories, RUP, V-Model XT,...)<br>Management Skills:<br><br>General Management, Technical Management (CTO), Software Architecture, Project Management (PMI, SCRUM, Kanban), Recruitment and management of motivated development teams. Management of distributed development teams. Leading a company from startup to agile distributed development. Agile development methodologies (especially Scrum, Kanban). In depth architectural understanding on building and maintaining large-scale web-based products. Very good presentation skills in English and German.
Professional experience: |
<img src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"> | **08/2014 – 01/2016: EPOST Develoopment GmbH Berlin CTO of EPOST development GmbH.** <br>Success: relaunch of www.epost.de, Implementation of team architects, introduction of people management.
<img src="https://www.otto.de/unternehmen/wLayout-oc/wGlobal/layout/images/logo.png">|**05/2012 – 07/2014: Leiter Softwareentwicklung, Otto GmbH & Co KG**<br>Heading a team of 60+ developers in a large agile setup (Projekt Lhotse). Success: relaunch of the www.otto.de eCommerce site, annual revenue > 2.000 Mio €.
<img src="https://corporate.xing.com/typo3temp/pics/b994770776.jpg"> |**11/ 2008 – 04/2012: Vice President Operations, XING AG**<br>Heading 4 teams of more than 35 staff responsible for site administration, Quality assurance, purchase and internal IT. Responsible for technical hiring. Setting up the procurement process and streamlining the technical hiring. Personnel marketing, talks on various conferences including topics of performance and agile production. Responsible for security and data protection at XING and representing the company in public (TV, Radio, expert panels).<br><b>08/2007 – 11/ 2008: Director Engineering, XING AG</b> <br>responsible for all Engineering aspects of XING AG, building up teams of Ruby on Rails developers, Frontend developers and project managers, >5M€ Budget, setting up a second data center, Mergers&Acquisitions. Setting up and staffing a remote development team in Barcelona.
<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/5/54/Lufthansa_Logo.svg/1024px-Lufthansa_Logo.svg.png"> | **05/2001 – 08/2007: Senior Consultant, Lufthansa Systems**<br>Senior consultant, Product Manager E-Business, Project Manager for more than 20 projects in the field of Web-Development, E-Business, EAI, SOA and security

<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/65/Logo_desy.svg/2000px-Logo_desy.svg.png"> | **04/1995 – 03/1997: Unix Administrator, Deutsches Elektronen Synchrotron, DESY**<br>Member of staff in the computer center<br>**02/1991 - 11/ 1995: DESY**<br>PhD in Physics, High Energy Physics Research, "Measurement of total photon-proton cross-section at HERA energies”<br>**1989 – 1991: Student, DESY**<br>Diploma thesis in computer science, Diploma Thesis in physics
